name: The 17th International Learning and Technology Conference: 5G & Beyond: Paving the way to 6G
content: Organized by Effat University, the Learning and Technology Conference is an annual event the University has been hosting since 2002, to showcase recent technological developments underpinning best practices and innovations in learning and teaching. Over the years, the Learning and Technology Conference has become an important event at the national and regional levels. In addition to attracting leading educators and students, the Conference also brings together with business leaders, technology experts, policy-makers and government officials from within, as well as from outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
